snippet.title: The Pale Beyond Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist The Pale Beyond now - https://bit.ly/TPB_Steam
Follow us on Twitter! https://twitter.com/bellularstudios
The Captain's missing, you're miles from civilisation, and you're stuck in the ice. You didn't ask for this, but now, everyone looks to you for leadership.
Manage your meagre resources, balance safety against morale, and head in the only direction you can - onward. The fate of the crew rests in your hands, and on your shoulders, as you enter The Pale Beyond.

The Pale Beyond is a branching narrative polar exploration game, with light sim elements. Fundamentally about leadership, it's heavily inspired by research into the real-life expeditions of the early 1900s.

While you're here, check out our website! https://bellular.games
